  • Method Details

    • createPersonFromMessage

      public void createPersonFromMessage(Long chatId, String messageText, AnimalType animalType)
      Creates personDog or personCat entity from the text message and saves it in DB
      Parameters:
      chatId - chat identification number from the telegram Message object
      messageText - text from the telegram Message object
      animalType - type of animal from enum AnimalType
      Throws:
      PersonAlreadyExistsException - if DB contains entry with such chatId
      TextDoesNotMatchPatternException - if text doesn't match the pattern

    • personProducer

      private AbstractPerson personProducer(Long chatId, AnimalType animalType, Predicate<Long> existsPredicate)

    • countDaysFromAdoption

      public Long countDaysFromAdoption(Long chatId, AnimalType animalType)
      Counts number of days from pet adoption until now for person with chatId
      Parameters:
      chatId - chat identification number from the telegram Message object
      Returns:
      number of days
      Throws:
      PersonNotFoundException - when there is no person with such chatId in DB
      NoAnimalAdoptedException - if person doesn't have adopted animal

    • getAbstractPerson

      private AbstractPerson getAbstractPerson(Long chatId, AnimalType animalType)

    • createReportFromMessage

      public Report createReportFromMessage(Long chatId, FotoObjectDto fotoObjectDto, String caption, AnimalType animalType)
      Creates report entity with text and photo file data, and saves it in DB
      Parameters:
      chatId - chat identification number from the telegram Message object
      fotoObjectDto - map which contains key-value pairs with photo file data
      caption - text from the telegram message with photo file
      Returns:
      report entity
      Throws:
      PersonNotFoundException - when there is no person with such chatId in DB
      NoAnimalAdoptedException - if person doesn't have adopted animal
      RuntimeException - with specific message when person has already sent report today

    • getNewReport

      private Report getNewReport(FotoObjectDto fotoObjDto, String caption)

    • parseText

      private ContactDataDto parseText(String text)
      Check if string matches the pattern and return list of it parts. If string doesn't match throws exception.
      Parameters:
      text - string to parse
      Returns:
      list of strings: name, phone, email, address
      Throws:
      TextDoesNotMatchPatternException - if string doesn't match the pattern

    • findPeopleToRemind

      public List<Long> findPeopleToRemind()
